summary.Title: Bakery Assistant / Bageriarbejder | Bager Mortensen | Nexø
summary.JobHeadline: Bakery Assistant / Bageriarbejder | Bager Mortensen | Nexø
summary.Presentation:
Would you love to work with bread and pastries?  Can you imagine yourself in a packaging and cake production environment? Then join our team at Bager Mortensen in Nexø?

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Bakery Assistant / Bageriarbejder | Bager Mortensen | Nexø
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Would you love to work with bread and pastries?  Can you imagine yourself in a packaging and cake production environment? Then join our team at Bager Mortensen in Nexø?

The job
A job with different work tasks:

  • Bread packing for out of the house orders
  • Cake glazing
  • Help with cream cakes

Qualifications
We have a focus on training you well, so specific qualifications or experience from the bakery industry would not be expected - although a plus.
We prefer a team-member that shows interest for the tasks, has an open attitude and is motivated to learn and contribute on a daily basis. We will count on you as an important part of our team, so punctuality in meeting-in is important to us.

A job for everyone
We encourages candidates with all backgrounds to apply for the job.
The position can be filled as a full-time position (37 hours/weekly) or with two part-time employees (18 hours/weekly).

Interested?
Send your application with a CV attached to karsten@bagermortensen.dk

We conduct interviews on an ongoing basis and will fill the position as soon as the right candidate is found.

Start date
As soon as possible after agreement.

We look forward to hearing from you.

#jobsforukraine

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Har du en konditor gemt i maven og kunne du tænke dig, at være en del af pakkeriet og kageproduktionen hos Bager Mortensen i Nexø? 

Jobbet
Et alsidigt job med flere forskellige arbejdsopgaver:

  • Pakning af brød til ud af huset
  • Glasering af kager
  • Hjælp med flødekager

Kvalifikationer
Vi vil sørge for at lære dig godt op, så vi forventer hverken erfaring eller kvalifikationer indenfor faget.
Vi lægger dog vægt på interesse og motivation for jobbet, samt at du er mødestabil.

Et job for alle
Vi opfordrer alle til at søge jobbet.  Stillingen kan bestrides som fuldtid (37 timer) eller af to ansatte på ca. 18 timer.

Interesseret?
Der indkaldes løbende til samtaler, så send meget gerne din ansøgning med CV allerede i dag til karsten@bagermortensen.dk.

Opstart
Hurtigt muligt.
Stillingen besættes, så snart en egnet kandidat er fundet.

Vi ser frem til at høre fra dig.
